title: Whats the brown on Gnar?!?

replies.body:
https://na.merch.riotgames.com/media/catalog/product/cache/1/image/570x/9df78eab33525d08d6e5fb8d27136e95/i/m/image_50.png

I have that plush, and the brown thing around his neck appears to be ornamental. He lacks it on his non-classic skins, so I reckon that it's some kind of fur shawl. After all, Gnar is a hunter in his own right.

Right! I totally disregarded the possibility of it being a Fur Shawl. Nice Catch! 

As for it being absent on his other skins, I would argue that his whole upper body and neck is covered with clothing (Snow Day -> Scarf || Dino -> The Dino Onesie). When thinking about it, the scarf on Snow Day might even be the Fur Shawl Equivalent on his normal skin. I think a fur shawl is on the right track.

One more thing. The plush has a bit of rope that ties behind Gnar's neck, which I think further reinforce the idea that it's an ornament. Whatever the brown thing is, it's definitely something he puts on.
